channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best New Netflix Movie Has Set A Rotten Tomatoes Score Record
item.description: A new Netflix original movie is its best film in a while, and it may have just set a Rotten Tomatoes record for the service.

item.title: The Services Industry Is Moving From Relocation To Reinvention
item.description: For decades, the services industry thrived on relocating work to lower-cost locations.
